front.title: Next step for DPRIVE: resolver-to-auth link

abstract.t: This document examines the possible future work for the DPRIVE (DNS privacy) working group, specially in securing the resolver-to- authoritative name server link with TLS under DNS. It is not intended to be published as a RFC. REMOVE BEFORE PUBLICATION: this document should be discussed in the IETF DPRIVE group, through its mailing list. The source of the document, as well as a list of open issues, is currently kept at Github [1].
